title: Project Detail View with Video Preview
acceptance_criteria: Project detail page shows video preview player
SEO Data section shows description, titles, tags
Copy YouTube Data button copies to clipboard

screenshots.name: dashboard-project-list.png
screenshots.description: Dashboard showing list of projects with status badges (draft/complete)

screenshots.name: project-detail-full.png
screenshots.description: Project detail page with video player, thumbnails, script, and SEO sections

db_queries.query: SELECT id, title, status, video_url FROM projects WHERE id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789001'
SELECT id, url, sequence_number FROM thumbnails WHERE project_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789001' ORDER BY sequence_number
